channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump says a U.S.-China trade deal is 'done'
item.description: After talks in London this week, the two countries say they're largely going back to a framework they already agreed on in May.

item.title: What is the status of DOGE now that Elon Musk is gone?
item.description: Washington Post Reporter Hannah Natanson says DOGE's mass firings made the government more inefficient. She also explains the risks of DOGE creating a...

item.title: Photos: See the dazzling pictures of June's Strawberry Moon
item.description: A strawberry moon occurs during the time of year when strawberries fully ripen.

item.title: Supreme Court press corps asks chief justice to live-stream court's opinions
item.description: The press corps' letter was sent to the chief justice a year ago, but there has been no response.

item.title: Brian Wilson, Songwriter and Leader of the Beach Boys, Dies at 82
item.description: A hitmaker elevated and burdened by the label of genius, he transcended the breezy surf genre to create complex harmonies and intricate soundscapes in...

item.title: Drag performers plan to protest Trump's attendance of 'Les Mis' at the Kennedy Center
item.description: The drag performers are expected to attend the musical alongside Trump, who after changing leadership at the Kennedy Center, said he would end drag sh...

item.title: CPI Shows U.S. Inflation Remains Muted as Tariff Impact Is Limited
item.description: The Consumer Price Index rose 2.4 percent in May, from a year earlier, a reading that reflects only the initial impact of President Trump’s tariffs.

item.title: The 2028 Subtext of Newsom’s Speech
item.description: The California governor used a nationally televised address to criticize President Trump and to seize a political moment.

item.title: Netanyahu Under Pressure as Ultra-Orthodox Parties Threaten to Dissolve Parliament
item.description: The Israeli prime minister’s coalition partners may back an opposition motion over rules that exempt most religious students from serving in the milit...

item.title: Fulbright Board Quits, Accusing Trump Administration of Political Interference
item.description: The board of the prestigious program told the State Department it had no right to cancel scholarships for nearly 200 American professors and researche...

item.title: This Elusive Antarctic Squid Was Seen for the First Time
item.description: An expedition in the Southern Ocean captured video of a rare species of deep-sea cephalopod. Until now, it had been found only in fishing nets and in ...

item.title: Today’s Anti-Trump Demonstrators Carry a Political Burden
item.description: Today’s anti-ICE, pro-immigration demonstrators are dragging the burden of how politics worked under Joe Biden’s presidency.

item.title: Mike Huckabee, U.S. Ambassador to Israel, Questions Palestinian State Policy
item.description: The suggestion by the U.S. Ambassador to Israel, Mike Huckabee, would represent a sharp departure from decades of U.S. foreign policy.

item.title: Tusk Government Wins Confidence Vote in Poland
item.description: Donald Tusk called the vote to seek endorsement of his government after a political opponent won the presidency.

item.title: Disney and Universal Sue A.I. Firm Midjourney for Copyright Infringement
item.description: The suit, against Midjourney, is the first time major Hollywood companies have sued over A.I.-generated images.
